meaning: contact, touch, feel, hit, proclaim, announce, conflict

onyomiExamples.meaning: detonation by contact, contact detonation, touching off (something), triggering, sparking, provocation, inspiration

onyomiExamples.reading: ガイシュウイッショク
onyomiExamples.meaning: (beating someone) hands down, with a single blow

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to touch, to feel, to touch (with), to experience, to come in contact with, to perceive, to touch on (a subject), to allude to, to refer to, to mention, to bring up, to be in conflict with, to violate (law, copyright, etc.), to infringe, to proclaim, to make known, to spread (e.g. a rumour)
to touch, to feel, to get involved (with), to approach, to be harmful to, to hinder, to interfere with, to irritate
to touch, to feel, to get involved (with), to approach, to be harmful to, to hinder, to interfere with, to irritate

kunyomiExamples.reading: さわらぬかみにたたりなし
kunyomiExamples.meaning: let sleeping dogs lie, wake not a sleeping lion, the spirit you do not approach will not curse you
